{{Marvel Database:Team Template | Image = O-Force (Earth-616) from X-Statix Vol 1 1 001.png | Name = O-Force | Aliases = | Status = Defunct | Identity = Public | Reality = Earth-616 | BaseOfOperations = | Leaders = Formerly [[Overkill (O-Force) (Earth-616)|Overkill]] (team leader), [[Solomon O'Sullivan (Earth-616)|Solomon O'Sullivan]] | CurrentMembers = | FormerMembers = [[Overkill (O-Force) (Earth-616)|Overkill]], [[Milton Peterson (Earth-616)|Obituary]], [[Ocean (Earth-616)|Ocean]], [[Ocelot (O-Force) (Earth-616)|Ocelot]], [[Ooze (Earth-616)|Ooze]], [[Orbit (O-Force) (Earth-616)|Orbit]],
'''Candidates:''' [[Ozone (Earth-616)|Ozone]], [[Orchid (O-Force) (Earth-616)|Orchid]], [[Optoman (Earth-616)|Optoman]], [[Oink (Earth-616)|Oink]], [[Oracle (O-Force) (Earth-616)|Oracle]] and [[Orifice (Earth-616)|Orifice]] | Allies = [[X-Statix (Earth-616)|X-Statix]] | Enemies = [[X-Statix (Earth-616)|X-Statix]] (media-concurrent), [[Arnold Lundberg (Earth-616)|Arnie Lunt]] and his [[Zombie|Zombies]] | Origin = | PlaceOfFormation = | PlaceOfDissolution = | Creators = Peter Milligan; Michael D. Allred | First = X-Statix #1 | Last = X-Statix #4 | HistoryText = O-Force were a [[Homo superior|Mutant]] team put together from a reality TV show created by [[Solomon O'Sullivan (Earth-616)|Solomon O'Sullivan]] where the audience could vote for the membership. After finalizing the team of [[Overkill (O-Force) (Earth-616)|Overkill]], [[Milton Peterson (Earth-616)|Obituary]], [[Ocean (Earth-616)|Ocean]], [[Ocelot (O-Force) (Earth-616)|Ocelot]], [[Ooze (Earth-616)|Ooze]] and [[Orbit (O-Force) (Earth-616)|Orbit]] they were sent on their first mission to rescue kidnapped celebrities.{{r|X-Statix #1}} However, unknown to the audience, the kidnapping was staged and they "rescued" the celebrities and killed the kidnappers (which the kidnappers didn't know would be the outcome). Solomon was approached by a police contact (who had been nudged by [[Spike (Freeman) (Earth-616)|Spike]] of [[X-Statix (Earth-616)|X-Statix]]) to get O-Force to investigate the town now under the control of [[Arnold Lundberg (Earth-616)|Arnie Lundberg]].{{r|X-Statix #2}} O'Sullivan began to brief O-Force on this mission but was interrupted by [[Guy Smith (Earth-616)|Orphan]], who attempted to warn O-Force how dangerous their next mission was. However, they ignored him and Orphan and O-Force fought until Ocean was able to hold him off with her water powers. O-Force then traveled to Arnie's town and began a live broadcast, which was seen by Arnie. In response, Arnie blew off Ocean's legs and he raised a [[Zombie]] army against them. The team were seemingly overwhelmed and Overkill fled, leaving Ocean to die at the hands of the zombies.{{r|X-Statix #3}} Ocean was rescued by Orphan and the zombie threat was neutralized by the rest of X-Statix. After Arnie was stopped, he healed the injured O-Force member's. Back in New York, O'Sullivan was accousted by angry fans who suspected everything (including the teams powers) were staged.{{r|X-Statix #4}} The exploits of the team are this are unknown but it is presumed to have disbanded. | Equipment = | Transportation = | Weapons = | Notes = * [[Dee Milo (Earth-616)|Venus Dee Milo]] was offered membership under a contract with [[Solomon O'Sullivan (Earth-616)|Solomon O'Sullivan]], but the contract was broken under Venus and Spike pressure, as the O-Force was about to be annihilated except for the intervention of [[X-Statix (Earth-616)|X-Statix]] using Venus' teleportation (prohibited by the contract). * It was said that O-Force mutant powers were possibly only special effects,{{r|X-Statix Vol 1 4}} but [[Ocean (Earth-616)|Ocean]] demonstrated her powers on the [[Guy Smith (Earth-616)|Orphan]] earlier.{{r|X-Statix Vol 1 3}} | Trivia = | Links = * http://www.marvunapp.com/Appendix/oforcexs.htm }} [[Category:Media-Driven Teams]]
